item.title: Potential planets supporting life in solar system
item.description: Potential planets supporting life in the solar system After a very long time, finally, I stopped procrastinating and start to write about astronomy again. In this blog post, I go through the planets that potentially support life in our solar system. I’m doing it because scientists found new stuff recently and so many new news floating around. Mars We are familiar with Mars, especially after successful Curiosity Rover landing. And it is getting more and more attractive as scientists make discoveries.
